about.title: About
about.description:
Real-time voice translation for competitive gaming.

Works with CS:GO 2, Valorant, Apex Legends, Dota 2, and other multiplayer games.

Features:
‚Ä¢ Real-time speech recognition using OpenAI Whisper
‚Ä¢ Automatic language detection
‚Ä¢ Live translation to your preferred language
‚Ä¢ On-screen subtitle overlay
‚Ä¢ Text-to-speech playback

Credits:
‚Ä¢ OpenAI Whisper - Speech recognition
‚Ä¢ Google Translate - Translation services
‚Ä¢ PyQt6 - GUI framework
‚Ä¢ VB-Audio Virtual Cable - Audio routing

help.title: Real-Time Game Voice Translation - Help
help.quick_start:
QUICK START:
1. Click 'Auto-Configure' to set up audio
2. Click 'Start Translation' to begin
3. Play your game - translations will appear as subtitles!

AUDIO SETUP:
‚Ä¢ Game Audio (Recommended) - Best for capturing game voice chat
‚Ä¢ System Audio - Captures all computer audio
‚Ä¢ Voice Input - Only captures microphone (not recommended for games)

SETTINGS:
‚Ä¢ Translation Language - Choose what language to translate TO
‚Ä¢ Show Subtitles - Display translations on screen
‚Ä¢ Subtitle Size - Adjust subtitle text size
‚Ä¢ Speak Translations - Play translations as speech (disabled for game audio)
help.voice_translation_help_text:
Voice Translation allows you to translate your own voice to teammates in real-time.

How it works:
1. Your microphone captures your speech
2. It's transcribed and translated to the target language
3. The translated speech is routed to a virtual microphone
4. Your game sees it as microphone input

Setup:
- Install VB-Audio Virtual Cable (free)
- In your game, select 'CABLE Output' as your microphone
- Enable voice translation and start playing!

Target Language Modes:
- Auto-detect: Automatically uses the most common teammate language
- Configurable: Manually select target language
- Same as teammates: Uses your main translation target language
